polls.question: What security and privacy related feature(s) should be added to ZeroNet?
polls.answers: Use HTTPS when the program is connecting to the clearnet. (e.g. use HTTPS when downloading GeoIP DB.)--|--Do not use clearnet port checkers!!! Clearnet port checkers can be compromised!--|--Work on preventing/mitigating XSS and browser fingerprinting.--|--Connect to a remote Tor SOCKS proxy. (of couse in LAN)--|--I want to revoke ZeroNet's control over the Tor Control Port. I will manually start an onion service and tell ZeroNet about it.--|--Open up a FileServer port only. Let me configure my Tor Hidden Service.--|--All of the above.--|--Some of the above. (Please comment)--|--I have a better idea. (Please comment)--|--I don't care. I use ZeroNet only to play Flappy Bird.--|--I don't care. My ISP will never track me and my country is absolutely libre.--|--Y r u using zeronet?zeronet slow and hard,reddit google wordpress fast and easy and safe!

comments.body:
Thanks for your attention. http://127.0.0.1:43110/zerosecurity.bit
Should we do more polls like this in the future?
